6.text:
When using night vision goggles, you can eliminate the humming sound to hear every step.

1. Activate your night vision goggles.

2. Perform an emote, like waving.

3. Notice the disappearance of the humming sound, allowing you to hear every step.

7.text:
When you die in Rust, you can continue to see what's happening around your body.

1. Die in the game.

2. As the map fades in, repeatedly press the ESC key.

3. Observe what's happening around your body and gather valuable information.

8.text:
Use the safe zones as your storage in Rust. If you kill yourself (/kill) in a safe zone, your body will remain there for 1 hour. Fill your inventory with items like nodes before you die, and you can use every slot. This way, you can have up to 37 slots for items stored safely in the safe zone.

1. Go to a safe zone in the game.

2. Fill your inventory with items you want to store.

3. Use the /kill command to kill your character.

4. Your body, along with the items, will remain in the safe zone for 1 hour.

9.text:
In Rust, you can prevent others from climbing into your compound by using gates instead of high walls. Ladders cannot be built on gates, making your compound more secure.

1. Choose to use gates instead of high walls for your compound.

2. Build your compound with these gates.

3. Now, others cannot use ladders to climb into your compound.
